entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Curious behavior with lambda vs method group conversion. #58880
  • Missing CS8908 #58878
  • Have a good way to track undocumented IDExxxx diagnostics #58876
  • WorkspaceConfigurationOptions are read from global options, which are not available OOP #58874
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Run simplifier on roslyn #58877
    Area-IDE
  • Restore feature to tell people when a lambda is unnecessary. #58875
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Formatter options refactoring - step 1 #58807
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Steps to investigate CI flakiness with async-streams tests #58864
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Async Streams, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/required-members #58883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Stack Trace Explorer to our searchable options #58869
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58814
    Area-IDE
  • Clone source from mirror for DartLab integration tests #58872
    Area-Infrastructure
